body.name: Geo F. Trumper Shaving Cream Tub - Lime
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 18 hrs 11 mins
features: Traditional English shave cream in a clean Lime fragrance.
body.description: Light, fluffy and fragrant. No... we're not talking about your favorite dessert. This classic "soft soap" formula provides moisture and protection for a perfect shave with or without a brush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use it with a shave brush, and it foams nicely.The scent is light and used weekly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars From Mayfair, London to home.
reviews.reviewText: When in London last year in Mayfair area, I visited the store, next door. Ever since, I have adopted old school shaving with a brush. My face feels better and I actually enjoy the experience. Great products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best lather EVER!
reviews.reviewText: It smells WONDERFUL! Ir is SO SMOOTH. It WORKS! the later comes off the brush and on the face with ease and allows the brush to glide over your cheeks. The razor seems to caress the face and together the lather guides the razor to a perfect shave, and then it leaves that lingering hit of lime as part of your ongoing aura.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells very nice
reviews.reviewText: I really like this shave cream. I have been able to stop using a post-shave balm now that I’m using this product. The smell is great. My wife loves the scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Trumper's Shave Creams Are The Best Made
reviews.reviewText: I know they sound expensive, but one tub lasts many months. Much longer than several cans of push button cream. Give it a try with a good badger brush and perhaps a scuttle in the winter and you will never go back. I have tried many English and Italian creams and soaps and none compare to Trumper's.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars An Honest Review
reviews.reviewText: I gave this product only 3 stars. It's difficult to rate because in some ways it's outstanding - while in other ways it's disappointing. I'll list the positives first. This is a quality shave no cream that provides a slick comfortable shave. On the Negative, it's aroma is almost nonexistent. You'll have to try hard to pickup a lime scent. Also the color of the cream is not like pictured in the photos. It's not green. It's almost pure white with a very slight greenish hue. So it comes down to this; the cream will provide a very good shave but that's about it. If the scent of lines is important to you then you'll have to bring your own limes because this cream doesn't have it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice lightly-scented shaving cream
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product in anticipation of summer and warmer weather, and I'm glad I did.This cream comes in a 200 g (~7 oz) screw-top tub. Upon opening the tub, there is a protective, clear-plastic cover underneath the lid. I assume this is used to better seal and protect the product from leaks. Mine arrived in good condition, with no leaks. When I opened the tub for the first time, I was greeted with a very light, clean soap smell, with a faint lime undertone. For me this is perfect, but if you like a strongly scented shaving cream, you may want to look elsewhere. Also, I should add that this shaving cream doesn't have the same true, freshly-cut lime smell that the rest of the Trumper West Indian Lime products do. This isn't necessarily a bad thing, as I find the scent of the shaving cream complements the other Trumper West Indian Lime products very well. The shaving cream itself is light green and slightly shiny. I find it very easy to create a voluminous, dense, luxurious lather with this cream using my Simpsons Commodore X3 best badger shaving brush. The lather itself is slick, very cushioning, and doesn't dry out on my face. My skin feels good post-shave, not overly moisturized or dry. To clarify, my skin is fairly oily and some shaving creams I've used seem to provide too much moisture, leaving my skin feeling oilier than I'd like right after a shave.In my opinion, this is a perfect warmer weather shaving cream that could certainly be used all year. I highly recommend this shaving cream to anyone wanting a lightly-scented, high-quality shave cream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great scent and great product
reviews.reviewText: Product lathers up easily and gives you a great shave with a fresh clean scent. This cream does not last as long as buying a soap, but it’s much easier to work into a lather.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Very enjoyable to use - gives a great alther for shaving.
reviews.reviewText: This product is enjoyable to use - gives a good lather and gentle scent. I leave the lid off occasionally to prevent it getting too damp - lasts longer that way.
Endlich eine gute Rasierseife gefunden. Ist sehr verträglich zur Haut und duftet auch noch gut.Netter Konkakt, unkompliziert, immer wieder gerne. Daumen hoch.
Ottima crema ma in rapporto al prezzo preferisco la Taylor

I have always loved the same of limes. However, it pains my soul to inform you that this cream smells "artificial". It does not have the sweet and sour and fresh smell you would expect from limes. Unless you're talking about limes growing in a galaxy far far away. There must be a way to improve this product to make it "natural lime".
Sehr angenehmer Duft nach Zitrone/Lime und sehr ergibig. Es reicht eine geringe Menge Rasiercreme auf dem Rasierpinsel, diese dann in einer Rasierschale aufschlagen.
